SELECT i.ID AS id, i.ITEMCODE AS CODE, i.ITEMNAME AS NAME, i.URLTYPE AS urltype, i.ITEMURL AS url, i.STATUS AS status, i.SORT AS sort FROM r_menuitem i
ORDER BY i.SORT ASC

SELECT DISTINCT mi.* FROM r_role r, r_menu m, r_menuitem mi, r_role_menu rm, r_role_menuitem rmi, r_user_role ur WHERE r.SYSTEMID = #{systemid} AND ur.USERID = #{userid} AND ur.ROLEID = r.ID AND r.`STATUS` = 'N' AND r.ID = rm.ROLEID AND m.ID = rm.MENUID AND m.`STATUS` = 'N' AND mi.MENUID = M.ID AND mi.`STATUS` = 'N' AND rmi.ROLEID = r.ID AND rmi.ITEMID = mi.ID
